timeline.author: wuchong

replies.bodyText: If the ReadableConfig is always an empty configuration. Please remove the parameter and construct in the findAndCreateTableSource method with a comment to explain why we use an empty configuration.
replies.author: wuchong

timeline.bodyText:
Add a hasProctimeAttribute to TableSourceValidation and the condition can be simplified into
if (hasRowtimeAttribute(source) && hasProctimeAttribute(source))
timeline.author: wuchong

timeline.bodyText: Add isStreamingMode into this condition, and findAndCreateTableSource  when the condition is satisfied.
timeline.author: wuchong

timeline.message: fixup: use CustomConnectorDescriptor in the added tests
